mapper.select: SELECT book_info.book_id, book_info.title, book_info.release_date, books.original_author, books.drawer, books.publisher FROM user_books INNER JOIN book_info ON user_books.book_id = book_info.book_id INNER JOIN books ON user_books.book_id = books.book_id WHERE user_books.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY book_info.release_date
